posts.title: Centos7.4 LNMP环境搭建
posts.text: 一：安装epel源1# yum install -y epel-release 二：更新YUM1# yum install -y update 三：安装nginx添加nginx源12345678910111213# cd /etc/yum.repos.d/# vi nginx.repo [nginx] name=nginx repo baseurl=http://nginx.org/packages/centos/$releasever/$basearch/ gpgcheck=0 enabled=1 安装nginx1# yum install -y nginx 查看nginx1# nginx -v 设置nginx开机默认启动1# systemctl enable nginx.service 配置：访问地址123456# vi /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf location / { root /usr/share/nginx/html; index index.php index.html index.htm; } 添加php支持1234567location ~ \.php$ { root /usr/share/nginx/html; fastcgi_pass 127.0.0.1:9000; fastcgi_index index.php; fastcgi_param SCRIPT_FILENAME $document_root$fastcgi_script_name; include fastcgi_params; } 启动nginx1# systemctl start nginx.service 重启nginx1# systemctl restart nginx.service 停止nginx1# systemctl stop nginx.service 四：安装php配置php的yum源12# rpm -Uvh https://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/epel-release-latest-7.noarch.rpm# rpm -Uvh https://mirror.webtatic.com/yum/el7/webtatic-release.rpm 安装php1# yum -y install php71w-devel 安装php拓展1# yum -y install php71w-devel php71w-fpm php71w-mysql php71w-gd php71w-ldap php71w-mbstring php71w-mcrypt php71w-odbc php71w-pear php71w-xml php71w-xmlrpc php71w-snmp php71w-soap curl curl-devel 查看php版本1234# php -vPHP 7.1.8 (cli) (built: Aug 9 2017 19:19:49) ( NTS )Copyright (c) 1997-2017 The PHP GroupZend Engine v3.1.0, Copyright (c) 1998-2017 Zend Technologies 查看php拓展1# php -m 配置PHP123456789101112131415# cp /etc/php.ini# sed -i 's/;cgi.fix_pathinfo=1/cgi.fix_pathinfo=0/g' /etc/php.ini# sed -i 's/post_max_size = 8M/post_max_size = 50M/g' /etc/php.ini# sed -i 's/upload_max_filesize = 2M/upload_max_filesize = 50M/g' /etc/php.ini# sed -i 's/;date.timezone =/date.timezone = PRC/g' /etc/php.ini# sed -i 's/max_execution_time = 30/max_execution_time = 300/g' /etc/php.ini# sed -i 's/disable_functions =.*/disable_functions = passthru,exec,system,chroot,scandir,chgrp,chown,shell_exec,proc_open,proc_get_status,popen,ini_alter,ini_restore,dl,openlog,syslog,readlink,symlink,popepassthru,stream_socket_server/g' /etc/php.ini# echo "zend_extension=/usr/local/ioncube/ioncube_loader_lin_5.4.so" >> /etc/php.ini 修改用户为nginx和修改组为nginx123# vi /etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf user = nginx group = nginx 查看php拓展1# php -m 设置php-fpm开机默认启动1# systemctl enable php-fpm.service 启动php-fpm1# systemctl start php-fpm.service 重启php-fpm1# systemctl restart php-fpm.service 停止php-fpm1# systemctl stop php-fpm.service 五： 安装maridb安装maridb1# yum -y install mariadb-server 设置服务端编码1#vi /etc/my.cnf 添加到 [mysqld] 这个标志下面 [mysqld]character-set-server=utf8 开启mariadb1#systemctl start mariadb 修改root密码###输入密码后回车再输入密码回车即可 1# mysqladmin -u root password 安全设置###输入你的密码后回车，根据你自己需要回车或者n,回车就是y 1# mysql_secure_installation 设置mariadb开机默认启动1# systemctl enable mariadb 重启mariadb1# systemctl restart mariadb 停止mariadb1# systemctl stop mariadb 六：配置phpmyadmin安装phpmyadmin1# yum -y install phpMyAdmin 配置通过yum安装的默认目录为/usr/share/phpMyAdmin，在/etc/nginx/conf.d/你站点的conf文件中的server加入以下代码：123456789101112131415# vi /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf location /phpmyadmin { alias /usr/share/phpMyAdmin; index index.php; } location ~ /phpmyadmin/.+\.php$ { if ($fastcgi_script_name ~ /phpmyadmin/(.+\.php.*)$) { set $valid_fastcgi_script_name $1; } include fastcgi_params; fastcgi_pass 127.0.0.1:9000; fastcgi_index index.php; fastcgi_param SCRIPT_FILENAME /usr/share/phpMyAdmin/$valid_fastcgi_script_name; } 打开http://你的的IP/pma，输入mysql的用户root和密码，测试mysql是否正常。结语后期一些详细的配置，nginx的缓存，反代理，静态资源配置会在后期更新。
